reference_a:
@article{hensel2023,
  title = {The feasibility of using ecological momentary assessment to understand urinary and fecal incontinence experiences in adults with spina bifida: {{A}} 30-day study},
  shorttitle = {The feasibility of using ecological momentary assessment to understand urinary and fecal incontinence experiences in adults with spina bifida},
  author = {Hensel, Devon J. and Young, Audrey I. and Szymanski, Konrad M.},
  date = {2023-11-30},
  journaltitle = {PLOS ONE},
  shortjournal = {PLOS ONE},
  volume = {18},
  number = {11},
  pages = {e0292735},
  publisher = {Public Library of Science},
  issn = {1932-6203},
  doi = {10.1371/journal.pone.0292735}
}
sampling_scheme: 1x/day for a window of four hours
participants: adults with spina bifida and current symptoms of incontinence
additional_comments: more individuals in the dataset than in the published paper; partially implicit missingness; some variable coding unclear, some likert scales have "prefer not to answer" option coded as 99 to distinguish it from missingness as NA

features.name: min_complete
features.coding: Coding unclear

features.name: distribution_channel
features.coding: email or smsinvite

features.name: q_recaptcha_score
features.coding: Coding not clear

features.name: q_recaptcha_assessment_name
features.coding: Coding not clear

features.details: Had sex

features.details: Texted, called someone or used the internet (social media, email, etc.)

features.coding: Watched TV or movie

features.coding: Other

features.details: Open-ended text for "Other"

features.name: amount_stool
features.coding:
How much stool did you typically leak today?
1 = A small amount (a little bit - a smear)  
2 = A medium amount  
3 = A large amount (a lot)  
99 = I prefer not to answer
features.details: How much stool did you typically leak today?
features.labels:
1 = A small amount (a little bit - a smear)  
2 = A medium amount  
3 = A large amount (a lot)  
99 = I prefer not to answer
features.construct: incontinence, physical symptom, physical health

features.name: amount_urine
features.coding:
How much urine did you usually leak today?

2 = A medium amount  
3 = A large amount (a lot)  
99 = I prefer not to answer

features.labels:
1 = A small amount (a little bit - a drip)

3 = A large amount (a lot)
